reviewtext: I called up their support number. Twice I got the answers of they are sending me an online link of the driver for two calls I made. So far I have not received any email they promised to send. The last call I was told I am going to get it within 10 minutes. It is not the case.I am disappointed not receiving the link so far. Don't know what is going on there. Only hope eventually I can get a workable driver.
summary: It is not worthy the money.
